list.title: Sunday Teaching
list.text: All of our teaching videos and series, including notes, questions, audio, and additional content. Check out what we're learning, or find what you're looking for in our video playlists.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: Livestream
list.text: We're live every Sunday at 10:00am EDT. A one hour livestream experience with stories, music, and teaching. If you're looking for a good first step, this is it. See you this Sunday!
list.imageAlt: Screen shot of Jimmy teaching during Sunday morning livestream at The Meeting House.

list.title: Podcasts
list.text: All of our Sunday teaching in one place. We've also got The After Party podcast where we chat with special guests about theology and culture and The Roundtable podcast where we discuss church life with our leaders, staff, and special guests.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: Kids & Youth Curriculum
list.text: Through Sunday morning teaching, midweek group resources, and The Parent Blog, our kids and youth curriculum is designed to partner with parents and leaders and equip them with resources to disciple their kids and youth well.
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

content.text1: Making peace is for everyone, not just those of us who are blessed with money. Check out how you can make an impact with your kids and youth.
